Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The backend class for controlling the game area's state.
    Version:
    2018.1213
    Author:
    Heikki Kangas

        Checks if theres EMPTYCHAR in the game area.
        Returns:
        true if full, false if not.

        public static boolean isTheCellEmpty(Cell cell)
        Checks if the given cell in gameArea is empty or not.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the cell is empty, false if not.

      • getWinner

        public static char getWinner()
        Checks if there's enough symbols in a row to win.
        Returns:
        the char of the winner, PLAYERCHAR or COMPUTERCHAR. If there's no winner, reuturns EMPTYCHAR.

      • getHorizontalWinner

        private static char getHorizontalWinner(char[][] gameArea)
        Checks for winners on horizontal lines.
        Parameters:
        gameArea - char[][] where to check for the win.
        Returns:
        the char of the winner, PLAYERCHAR or COMPUTERCHAR. If there's no winner, returns EMPTYCHAR.

      • getVerticalWinner

        private static char getVerticalWinner(char[][] gameArea)
        Checks for winners on vertical lines.
        Parameters:
        gameArea - char[][] where to check for the win.
        Returns:
        the char of the winner, PLAYERCHAR or COMPUTERCHAR. If there's no winner, reuturns EMPTYCHAR.

      • getDiagonalWinner

        private static char getDiagonalWinner(char[][] gameArea)
        Checks if there's winning row in diagonal direction.
        Parameters:
        gameArea - char[][] where to check for the win.
        Returns:
        the char of the winner, PLAYERCHAR or COMPUTERCHAR. If there's no winner, reuturns EMPTYCHAR.

      • getSymbol

        public static char getSymbol(Cell cell)
        Returns the symbol at given cell's coordinates.
        Parameters:
        cell - the coordinates to check.
        Returns:
        the char at given location.

      • getWinningMove

        public static Cell getWinningMove(char[][] gameArea,
                                  Cell cell)
        Ai uses this to checks if there's win available by filling some empty cell.
        Parameters:
        gameArea - char[][] where to check for the win.
        cell - coordinates of last added symbol.
        Returns:
        if there's winning move, returns the original cell updated with winner char, if not returns cell with -1, -1 coordinates

      • getGameArea

        public static char[][] getGameArea()
        Getter for gameArea.
        Returns:
        2D Array of the game area.

      • insertSymbol

        private static void insertSymbol(Cell cell,
                                 char symbol)
        Inserts the given symbol to given cell's coordinates in the gameArea.
        Parameters:
        cell - coordinates where to insert the symbol.
        symbol - to insert at given coordinates.

      • insertUserSymbol

        public static boolean insertUserSymbol(Cell cell)
        Inserts PLAYERCHAR if the selected cell is empty.
        Parameters:
        cell - coordinates where to insert the PLAYERCHAR.
        Returns:
        true if the cell was empty, false if not.

      • insertComputerSymbol

        public static void insertComputerSymbol(Cell cell)
        Insert COMPUTERCHAR to the given cell.
        Parameters:
        cell - coordinates where to insert the COMPUTERCHAR.

      • insertSymbol

        public static char[][] insertSymbol(Cell cell,
                                    char[][] gameArea,
                                    char charToInsert)
        Inserts COMPUTERCHAR to the given cell on the given char[][] game area.
        Parameters:
        cell - coordinates where to insert the symbol.
        gameArea - where we insert the symbol into.
        charToInsert - what char should be inserted to the given game area.
        Returns:
        the game area with the symboll added at the given coordinates.

      • getRoundsPlayed

        public static int getRoundsPlayed()
        Get the amount of rounds played.
        Returns:
        number of rounds played this far.

        Returns:

        Returns:
        number of symbols in row required to win.

        Clones the current game area.
        Returns:
